other_tests.findings: Significant hepatic steatosis and hepatomegaly. Mild pericholecystic fluid and edema within the gallbladder wall near the fundus. Gallstone in the gallbladder. No dilatation of the intra or extrahepatic biliary tree.
CBD 4mm, gallbladder with mobile 2.5mm stone, pericholecystic fluid, gallbladder wall thickness 3.7mm, positive sonographic sign. No evidence of choledocholithiasis.
